#summary Appengine Admin features.
#labels Featured

= Implemented features =
  * List records for each registered model
  * Create new records
  * Update/edit records
  * Delete records
  * Supported and tested model property types:
    * [http://code.google.com/appengine/docs/datastore/typesandpropertyclasses.html#StringProperty StringProperty]
    * [http://code.google.com/appengine/docs/datastore/typesandpropertyclasses.html#IntegerProperty IntegerProperty]
    * [http://code.google.com/appengine/docs/datastore/typesandpropertyclasses.html#FloatProperty FloatProperty]
    * [http://code.google.com/appengine/docs/datastore/typesandpropertyclasses.html#DateTimeProperty DateTimeProperty]
    * [http://code.google.com/appengine/docs/datastore/typesandpropertyclasses.html#ReferenceProperty ReferenceProperty]
    * [http://code.google.com/appengine/docs/datastore/typesandpropertyclasses.html#TextProperty TextProperty]
    * [http://code.google.com/appengine/docs/datastore/typesandpropertyclasses.html#BooleanProperty BooleanProperty]
  * Not tested but should be usable without additional patches:
    * [http://code.google.com/appengine/docs/datastore/typesandpropertyclasses.html#DateProperty DateProperty]
    * [http://code.google.com/appengine/docs/datastore/typesandpropertyclasses.html#TimeProperty TimeProperty]
    * [http://code.google.com/appengine/docs/datastore/typesandpropertyclasses.html#UserProperty UserProperty]
    * [http://code.google.com/appengine/docs/datastore/typesandpropertyclasses.html#CategoryProperty CategoryProperty]
    * [http://code.google.com/appengine/docs/datastore/typesandpropertyclasses.html#LinkProperty LinkProperty]
    * [http://code.google.com/appengine/docs/datastore/typesandpropertyclasses.html#EmailProperty EmailProperty]
    * [http://code.google.com/appengine/docs/datastore/typesandpropertyclasses.html#IMProperty IMProperty]
    * [http://code.google.com/appengine/docs/datastore/typesandpropertyclasses.html#PhoneNumberProperty PhoneNumberProperty]
    * [http://code.google.com/appengine/docs/datastore/typesandpropertyclasses.html#PostalAddressProperty PostalAddressProperty]
    * [http://code.google.com/appengine/docs/datastore/typesandpropertyclasses.html#RatingProperty RatingProperty]
  * These property types have custom widgets:
    * Any property with `choices`: dropdown list
    * [http://code.google.com/appengine/docs/datastore/typesandpropertyclasses.html#TextProperty TextProperty] - Textarea
    * [http://code.google.com/appengine/docs/datastore/typesandpropertyclasses.html#ReferenceProperty ReferenceProperty] - dropdown list of existing records
  * These property types need some additional work in Appengine Admin to be really usable:
    * [http://code.google.com/appengine/docs/datastore/typesandpropertyclasses.html#BlobProperty BlobProperty]
    * [http://code.google.com/appengine/docs/datastore/typesandpropertyclasses.html#SelfReferenceProperty SelfReferenceProperty]
    * [http://code.google.com/appengine/docs/datastore/typesandpropertyclasses.html#GeoPtProperty GeoPtProperty]
